title: 81/800/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 September 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'ETEC- Autoscan scanning electron microscope' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 September 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "ETEC-Autoscan scanning electron microscope" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/800/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "ETEC-Autoscan electron microscope", which is the subject of an application by Italy of 21 March 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 September 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
